Package org.jaudiotagger.audio.mp4

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Mp4AtomTree
    Tree representing atoms in the mp4 file

    Note it doesn't create the complete tree it delves into subtrees for atom we know about and are interested in.
    Mp4AudioHeader
    Store some additional attributes not available for all audio types
    Mp4FileReader
    Mp4 File Reader

    Mp4FileWriter
    Mp4 File Writer

    Mp4InfoReader
    Read audio info from file.
    Mp4TagReader
    Reads metadata from mp4,

    Mp4TagWriter
    Writes metadata from mp4, the metadata tags are held under the ilst atom as shown below, (note all free atoms are optional).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EncoderType
    Encoder Type actually identifies the format of the audio within the mp4.
    Mp4AtomIdentifier
    This a list of mp4boxes identifiers that can bwe found in a mp4 container.
